title: Deutsche Bank, DWS Offices in Frankfurt Searched Over Greenwashing Claims
sub_head: German lender’s asset-management arm probed by country’s market regulator
body:
Authorities in Frankfurt searched the offices of Deutsche Bank AG and its subsidiary DWS Group on Tuesday, over allegations of greenwashing at the German lender’s asset-management arm.
A spokeswoman for Frankfurt’s prosecutor’s office said the initial suspicion was of investment fraud.
